channel.title: Java on My Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Java on My Portfolio

item.title: Monster Fighter
item.description: A turn-based player-vs-computer game made for Windows. The goal is to fight the enemy monster teams while upgrading yours. You have a limited number of days and must aim to achieve the best score by picking your fights carefully. This game was made in 2022 as a university course project between Farzad Hayatbakhsh and Daniel Cha. This game was made using Java and the Swing GUI Toolkit. Download Source Code + Java Executable
